title: Blue Blooded Final 4
description:
Tony Kornheiser and Michael Wilbon discuss their expectations for a Final 4 loaded with blue bloods including what to expect as UNC and Duke face off for the first time in the NCAA Tournament.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
